result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. ROBBIE A REINER

records.addlTxt:
2:44 PM Defendant ROBBIE A REINER in court.  Prosecuting attorney Sara Matthews in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant informs the Court he recently applied. He now qualifies for SPD. 
Bond continued.
Review hearing scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
2:45 PM Defendant ROBBIE A REINER in court.  Prosecuting attorney Sheila M. Yohnk in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives reading of complaint. 
Defendant is informed of charges. 
Defendant received copy of Criminal Complaint. 
If defendant wishes to obtain attorney, Court directs defendant to apply with SPD. If denied, to apply for court appointed attorney. 
Bond continued.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Review hearing scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant is ordered to report to pretrial monitoring immediately alter court and must comply with pretrial
monitoring conditions.
Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs.
No to possess any drug paraphernalia,
Not to possess syringes unless medically required.
Not to possess or consume any prescription drugs not prescribed.
Not to associate with anyone involved in illegal drug activities.

Prosecuting attorney Roy La Barton Gay in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant ROBBIE A REINER appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kirby Daniel Harless appeared by video for ROBBIE A REINER.
